title: DDFP 332: Combine review & free agency preview
itunes:title: DDFP 332: Combine review & free agency preview
description:
Shek is joined by Handsome Hank and NFL Media's Marcas Grant to discuss how to improve the combine experience and the best free agency fits for Jay Cutler, Adrian Peterson, Julius Thomas and more. Plus, which recent Heisman trophy winning quarterback has the least promising future: Jameis Winston, Marcus Mariota, Johnny Manziel or Robert Griffin III? 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
